item.title: Google Analytics
item.description: As a presentation author you can activate Google Analytics tracking for your slideshow presentations. See the Google Analytics Setting documentation for further details.

item.title: Auto-Generated TOC
item.description: GitPitch automatically generates a table-of-contents for every slideshow presentation. You can access the table-of-contents within the slideshow menu found in the bottom-left corner of any slideshow. The table-of-contents can be used to browse slideshow content. It can also be used as a means of fast navigation to any slide within a presentation. As a presentation author, if you update your presentation content in PITCHME.md, GitPitch will automatically update the table-of-contents for you.

item.title: Keyboard Controls
item.description: GitPitch slideshow presentations offer numerous keyboard controls and shortcuts to help presentation authors and their audiences to navigate and interact with slideshow content. Live presentation speakers should take special note of the following slideshow modes: Press F for Fullscreen Mode Press O for Overview Mode Press B for Blackout Mode Press the ? key when viewing any slideshow presentation to view the following keyboard shortcuts table: Beyond keyboard navigations, GitPitch also supports mouse-wheel navigation and remote-control navigation .

item.title: Slideshow Embedding
item.description: GitPitch slideshow presentations can be seamlessly embedded within all of the major blogging platforms - including WordPress, Blogger, Tumblr, and Medium. To embed your slideshow presentation in a blog post or website use the GitPitch Embed.ly Provider . For further details, see the following blog post .

item.title: Built on Reveal.js
item.description: GitPitch embraces and extends the slideshow capabilities of the hugely popular and powerful Reveal.js library with the distributed and collaborative file management capabilities of Git to deliver a seamless and unique presentation service on gitpitch.com . GitPitch is standing on the shoulders of giants. And adding unique value by offering a modern slide deck solution uniquely adapted for developers.
